task.title: Setup a React application to implement results presentation
task.shortdesc: How to create a React Results page for Webhelp template?

context.p: So to create a results page in React and put it into Webhelp template we have to create only the part of the page where results are presented. Basically we don't need any search bars.

step.cmd: Create a basic React application with npm in new directory in the root of the template and install these dependencies:
Now create a directory src/components/filter and src/components/hits
In the root directory of the React application create App.js
You're all done, now you have an React application that renders a completely new results page. But now create in the root of the React application don't forget to create an algolia-config.json
